channel.title: Braxton Wolfes Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Braxton Wolfes Sports Blog

item.title: Victor Wembanyama's Defensive Pace Versus Legends And Current Trajectory
item.description: Victor Wembanyama was regarded as the best prospect to enter the NBA since Lebron James over two decades ago. A primary reason for this was his elite two way ability, specifically his ability to impact the defensive side of the ball at a level we do not see in the NBA today. While a lot of that defensive hype he has gotten is because of his extraordinary size, there are plenty of other key factors and areas that Wembanyama thrives in to make his impact felt so much on the basketball court.

item.title: Victor Wembanyama's Defensive Impact
item.description: This blog was created to compare the pace at which Victor Wembanyama is on to becoming the greatest defender in NBA history stacked up against some of the all time best defenders the league has seen. We also are looking into the impact that he has on todays NBA and the implications he creates with the San Antonio Spurs defensively.
